post_content: All sold. Thanks to everyone who purchased along the way
more scans

Listing updated. The SLers are sold, and a group of 86 commons sold. The remaining lot of 154 commons is for sale. This would make an excellent starter binder set, as you can see in the scans, this set looks so good in a binder. 

Please send any questions/inquiries to me via PM here. Thanks for looking.

Since I know there may be a limited number of people looking to buy 150+ T206 all at once, I will make one concession here. 

I am willing to split up these 154 cards into separate lots, but you need to buy at least 10 cards from what remains. If you are willing to buy at least 10 cards, I will break this up. However, I am not going to continually re-scan the cards to remove the ones that have sold, I will simply update the master list of what remains in the first post, so make sure you read that before you reach out. 

First come, first served. I am not pricing the cards individually, if you are interested in at least 10 cards, you PM me the list of cards you are interested in, I will quote you a price, and we will go from there. 

Thank you.

small price drop. If you want to buy 10+ cards from the lot, send me a PM with your list and I will provide you with a price. 

Thanks

no takers on these as a lot, so i have individually priced them. first post is updated. i am also open to trades for T205s I don't have, as well as M101-2s that i dont have. those are my only two trade list items for right now. please send any questions via PM. thanks
a bunch of cards have sold, the list in the first post is updated. anything with a [STRIKE]strikethrough[/STRIKE] means it is sold and no longer available.
115 cards remaining here. I believe my list price for each card individually is close to $5800. If you want to buy all of them, I will work with you on the price
first post is updated to show what cards remain, 107 in total. also willing to do a bulk discount if you want to buy all of them. thanks
price drops implemented for most of the cards on the list.

Still willing to sell the lot for a discounted price.

Ben
